
                            
                            <p>感谢东哥买单，猪脚饭2.52到手。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/09/193122txztzgt8lc8gla4i.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/09/193122txztzgt8lc8gla4i.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">城里真好 小镇连个外卖都没有</p><p class="pl">感谢东哥烧鸡7元</p><p class="pl">都吃麻了</p>
